patthana16.78:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.78:5.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.78:6.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.78:6.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.78:6.3: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
